decision_conditions: The proposed side dormer windows, by reason of their design, bulk, scale and mass, would appear dominant, intrusive and incongruous, out of scale and character with the site and surrounding area, and would be materially harmful to the visual amenity of the surrounding area contrary to the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document, Policies 7 and 26 of the Havering Local Plan and the NPPF 2023.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, it was necessary to issue a decision as close to the statutory timeframe as possible as opposed to seeking amendments which would have significantly delayed the application.
description: Loft conversion with side dormers on the detached bunglow
